variable.description: ID of the last uploaded post. If endCursorPostId not provided, the first set of posts is returned.

request.description:
You can pass the `refreshToken` in the request to `get the like status` for each post related to the `currently authorized user` or none like status if user not authorized. 
        
 Posts that belong to the current authorized are the first to be displayed.

item.name: Get comments for post by post id

request.description:
You can pass the `refreshToken` in the request to `get the like status` for each comment related to the `currently authorized user` or none like status if user not authorized. 
        
 Comments that belong to the current authorized are the first to be displayed.
